new_york_city_311.query: SELECT * WHERE created_date > '$date' AND status = 'Open' AND (STARTS_WITH(complaint_type, 'Street Condition') OR STARTS_WITH(complaint_type, 'General Construction/Plumbing') OR STARTS_WITH(complaint_type, 'Street Light Condition') OR STARTS_WITH(complaint_type, 'Illegal Parking')) LIMIT 100
